# Overview {-}

This is the handbook for STAT500.  Details of the course structure,
including assessment and timetables, may be found on AUTonline.  The
whole course is based around R and RStudio which may be downloaded
from

[https://cran.r-project.org/]

and

[https://www.rstudio.com/]

On AUTonline, clicking

`content system -> institution -> learn -> maths`

takes you to a number of mathematical resources, including a wide
range of instructional videos prepared for AUT students.  Details will
be disseminated on Blackboard (AUTonline).

This manual is distributed under the GNU GPL and is available at

[https://github.com/RobinHankin/stat500](https://github.com/RobinHankin/stat500)

Please feel free to send corrections, bug reports, fanmail, etc to the
issues page.

[https://github.com/RobinHankin/stat500/issues](https://github.com/RobinHankin/stat500/issues)
